about_the_game:
You have been given the tools. You have been given the capital. Now, it is time for you to use your imagination and design a top-secret facility to the best of your ability to house anomalous entities based off the SCP Foundation.

Immerse yourself in a world where strange creatures exist, and your job is to contain them.


D-Class personnel – short for "Disposable personnel" – are sourced from the world's most dangerous prisons and affiliated with the most dangerous gangs. Keep them happy, lest they sabotage your operations.

At the end of their contract, you may choose to administer amnestics to clear their memory and let them free, or terminate them. Nobody needs to know.


Managing such an important facility comes at a cost. There will be many unique challenges thrown your way. Not only do you need to know how to handle them, but you should be constructing your facility to prepare for these in advance.

  • Groups such as the Chaos Insurgency – consisting of ex-Foundation personnel – will attempt to sabotage your operations and take any opportunity they can to raid your facility.
  • Having your facility located at such a secluded place comes at the cost of severe weather. Make sure to prepare for extreme temperatures, or for your power grid to go offline as sandstorms/snowstorms seap through the lands.
  • SCPs are purportedly sentient beings, and they do not necessarily enjoy being captured. One or more of them may break loose in a containment breach.

What is the SCP Foundation?

The SCP Foundation is a secretive organization that contains anomalous or supernatural items and entities away from the eyes of the public. SCP stands for Secure, Contain, Protect.

Your role in this game is to handle all the operations of a facility managed by the SCP Foundation, including construction, management, containing SCPs, handling situations and more.
